math.alttext: 0\leq x\leq L_{x},\quad 0\leq y\leq L_{y},\quad G_{ij}=\mathop{\rm diag}% \nolimits(1,1),

semantics.annotation: NUMBER:0 RELOP:less-than-or-equals italic-x RELOP:less-than-or-equals italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end PUNCT:, NUMBER:0 RELOP:less-than-or-equals italic-y RELOP:less-than-or-equals italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end PUNCT:, italic-G POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-i italic-j POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals BIGOP:diag OPEN:( NUMBER:1 PUNCT:, NUMBER:1 CLOSE:) PUNCT:,
0\leq x\leq L_{x},\quad 0\leq y\leq L_{y},\quad G_{ij}=\mathop{\rm diag}% \nolimits(1,1),

NUMBER:0 RELOP:less-than-or-equals italic-x RELOP:less-than-or-equals NUMBER:1 PUNCT:, NUMBER:0 RELOP:less-than-or-equals italic-y RELOP:less-than-or-equals NUMBER:1 PUNCT:, italic-G POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-i italic-j POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals BIGOP:diag OPEN:( italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PUNCT:, italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
0\leq x\leq 1,\quad 0\leq y\leq 1,\quad G_{ij}=\mathop{\rm diag}\nolimits(L_{x% }^{2},L_{y}^{2}).

Phi RELOP:equals italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-phi PUNCT:, italic-F RELOP:equals italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-f PUNCT:,
\Phi=L_{x}L_{y}\phi,\quad F=L_{x}L_{y}f,

OVERACCENT:widetilde ARG:start italic-L ARG:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi ARG:end ARG:start italic-T italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end PUNCT:,
\widetilde{L}_{y}=\frac{2\pi}{TL_{y}},
ATOM:slopeofthebase RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-phi ARG:end ARG:start italic-T ARG:end PERIOD:.
\mbox{slope of the base}=\frac{\phi}{T}.

NUMBER:2 italic-pi FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-y ARG:end ARG:start OVERACCENT:widetilde ARG:start italic-L ARG:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end RELOP:equals italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-a POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end PERIOD:.
2\pi\frac{y}{\widetilde{L}_{y}}=L_{y}a_{y}.
FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-d italic-y ARG:end ARG:start italic-d italic-x ARG:end RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-f ARG:end ARG:start italic-T ARG:end PUNCT:,
\frac{dy}{dx}=\frac{f}{T},
ATOM:slopeoftheD1-brane RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-f ADDOP:plus italic-phi ARG:end ARG:start italic-T ARG:end PERIOD:.
\mbox{slope of the D1-brane}=\frac{f+\phi}{T}.

italic-theta RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start Delta ARG:end ARG:start italic-T OVERACCENT:widetilde ARG:start italic-L ARG:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end PERIOD:.
\theta=\frac{\Delta}{T\widetilde{L}_{y}}.

Theta RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end italic-theta PERIOD:.
\Theta=\frac{1}{L_{x}L_{y}}\theta.

italic-phi POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-n POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-x CLOSE:) RELOP:equals SUMOP:sum POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-phi POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-n ADDOP:minus italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-x ADDOP:minus Delta FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-n ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 ARG:end CLOSE:) italic-phi POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:3 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-x ADDOP:plus Delta FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-n ADDOP:minus italic-k ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 ARG:end CLOSE:)
\phi^{1}_{n}(x)=\sum_{k}\phi^{2}_{n-k}\left(x-\Delta\frac{n}{2}\right)\phi^{3}% _{k}\left(x+\Delta\frac{n-k}{2}\right)

italic-phi OPEN:( italic-x PUNCT:, italic-y CLOSE:) RELOP:equals SUMOP:sum POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-n POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-e POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-i italic-n italic-y MULOP:divide italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-phi POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-n POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-x CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
\phi(x,y)=\sum_{n}e^{2\pi iny/L_{y}}\phi_{n}(x).

OPERATOR:nabla POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-psi RELOP:equals OPERATOR:partial-differential POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-psi ADDOP:plus italic-i italic-a POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end MULOP:times italic-psi ADDOP:minus italic-i italic-psi MULOP:times italic-a POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end PERIOD:.
\nabla_{y}\psi=\partial_{y}\psi+ia_{y}*\psi-i\psi*a_{y}.

OPERATOR:nabla POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-psi RELOP:equals OPEN:( NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-f italic-theta CLOSE:) OPERATOR:partial-differential POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-psi PERIOD:.
\nabla_{y}\psi=(1-f\theta)\partial_{y}\psi.

italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start eff POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-f italic-theta ARG:end PERIOD:.
L_{y}^{\rm eff}=\frac{L_{y}}{1-f\theta}.

FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-f ARG:end ARG:start italic-T ARG:end RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start OVERACCENT:widetilde ARG:start italic-L ARG:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-n ARG:end ARG:start italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus Delta italic-n ARG:end PUNCT:, italic-n RELOP:element-of bold-Z PERIOD:.
\frac{f}{T}=\frac{\widetilde{L}_{y}n}{L_{x}+\Delta n},\quad n\in{\bf Z}.
italic-a POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-x CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-f italic-x PERIOD:.
a_{y}(x)=fx.

italic-a POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( NUMBER:0 CLOSE:) RELOP:equals ADDOP:minus italic-i italic-U OPEN:( italic-y CLOSE:) MULOP:times OPERATOR:partial-differential POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-U POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-y CLOSE:) ADDOP:plus italic-U OPEN:( italic-y CLOSE:) MULOP:times italic-a POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) MULOP:times italic-U POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-y CLOSE:) PERIOD:.

italic-U OPEN:( italic-y CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-e POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-i italic-n italic-y MULOP:divide italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PUNCT:, italic-n RELOP:element-of bold-Z PERIOD:.
U(y)=e^{2\pi iny/L_{y}},\quad n\in{\bf Z}.

italic-e POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-i italic-k italic-y POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end MULOP:times italic-u OPEN:( italic-x CLOSE:) MULOP:times italic-e POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ADDOP:minus italic-i italic-k italic-y POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals italic-u OPEN:( italic-x ADDOP:plus italic-k italic-theta CLOSE:) PUNCT:,
e^{iky}*u(x)*e^{-iky}=u(x+k\theta),

italic-a POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( NUMBER:0 CLOSE:) RELOP:equals ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-n ARG:end ARG:start italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ADDOP:plus italic-a POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-n FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-theta ARG:end ARG:start italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
a_{y}(0)=-\frac{2\pi n}{L_{y}}+a_{y}\left(L_{x}+2\pi n\frac{\theta}{L_{y}}% \right).

italic-f RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-n MULOP:divide italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-n italic-theta MULOP:divide italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end PUNCT:,
f=\frac{2\pi n/L_{y}}{L_{x}+2\pi n\theta/L_{y}},

italic-M POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-i italic-j POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-G POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-i italic-j POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:minus Phi POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-i italic-j POSTSUBSCRIPT:end MULOP:divide italic-T ARG:end ADDOP:plus italic-T Theta POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-i italic-j POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PUNCT:,
M^{ij}=\frac{1}{G_{ij}-\Phi_{ij}/T}+T\Theta^{ij},

Phi POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-i italic-j POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals OPEN:( ARRAY:start ROW:start CELL:start CELL:end CELL:start ADDOP:minus Phi CELL:end ROW:end ROW:start CELL:start Phi CELL:end CELL:start CELL:end ROW:end ARRAY:end CLOSE:) PUNCT:, Theta POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-i italic-j POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals OPEN:( ARRAY:start ROW:start CELL:start CELL:end CELL:start ADDOP:minus Theta CELL:end ROW:end ROW:start CELL:start Theta CELL:end CELL:start CELL:end ROW:end ARRAY:end CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
\Phi_{ij}=\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}&-\Phi\\ \Phi\end{array}\right),\quad\Theta^{ij}=\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}&-\Theta\\ \Theta\end{array}\right).

italic-M POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-i italic-j POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( NUMBER:1 ADDOP:plus italic-phi POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end MULOP:divide italic-T POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) ARG:end OPEN:( ARRAY:start ROW:start CELL:start italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end MULOP:divide italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end CELL:end CELL:start ADDOP:minus italic-phi MULOP:divide italic-T ADDOP:minus OPEN:( NUMBER:1 ADDOP:plus italic-phi POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end MULOP:divide italic-T POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) italic-T italic-theta CELL:end ROW:end ROW:start CELL:start italic-phi MULOP:divide italic-T ADDOP:plus OPEN:( NUMBER:1 ADDOP:plus italic-phi POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end MULOP:divide italic-T POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) italic-T italic-theta CELL:end CELL:start italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end MULOP:divide italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end CELL:end ROW:end ARRAY:end CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
M^{ij}=\frac{1}{L_{x}L_{y}(1+\phi^{2}/T^{2})}\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}L_{y}/L_% {x}&-\phi/T-(1+\phi^{2}/T^{2})T\theta\\ \phi/T+(1+\phi^{2}/T^{2})T\theta&L_{x}/L_{y}\end{array}\right).

italic-M POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-i italic-j POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals OPEN:( ARRAY:start ROW:start CELL:start NUMBER:1 MULOP:divide italic-b POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CELL:end CELL:start ADDOP:minus OPEN:( italic-T italic-a MULOP:divide NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-b CLOSE:) TRIGFUNCTION:cosine italic-gamma CELL:end ROW:end ROW:start CELL:start OPEN:( italic-T italic-a MULOP:divide NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-b CLOSE:) TRIGFUNCTION:cosine italic-gamma CELL:end CELL:start OPEN:( italic-T italic-a MULOP:divide NUMBER:2 italic-pi CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end TRIGFUNCTION:sine POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-gamma CELL:end ROW:end ARRAY:end CLOSE:) PUNCT:,
M^{ij}=\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}1/b^{2}&-(Ta/2\pi b)\cos\gamma\\ (Ta/2\pi b)\cos\gamma&(Ta/2\pi)^{2}\sin^{2}\gamma\end{array}\right),

FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-F ARG:end ADDOP:minus Theta RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-F POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end PUNCT:,
\frac{1}{F}-\Theta=\frac{1}{F_{0}},

FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-F ARG:end ADDOP:minus Theta RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-a ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-c ARG:end PUNCT:,
\frac{1}{F}-\Theta=\frac{a}{2\pi c},

OVERACCENT:vec ARG:start italic-v ARG:end RELOP:equals italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( NUMBER:1 PUNCT:, italic-phi CLOSE:) PUNCT:, OVERACCENT:vec ARG:start italic-w ARG:end RELOP:equals OVERACCENT:widetilde ARG:start italic-L ARG:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-theta PUNCT:, NUMBER:1 ADDOP:plus italic-theta italic-phi CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
\vec{v}=L_{x}(1,\phi),\quad\vec{w}=\widetilde{L}_{y}(\theta,1+\theta\phi).

OVERACCENT:vec ARG:start italic-v ARG:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals italic-A OVERACCENT:vec ARG:start italic-v ARG:end ADDOP:plus italic-B OVERACCENT:vec ARG:start italic-w ARG:end PUNCT:, OVERACCENT:vec ARG:start italic-w ARG:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals italic-C OVERACCENT:vec ARG:start italic-v ARG:end ADDOP:plus italic-D OVERACCENT:vec ARG:start italic-w ARG:end PUNCT:,
\vec{v}^{\prime}=A\vec{v}+B\vec{w},\quad\vec{w}^{\prime}=C\vec{v}+D\vec{w},

italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals OPEN:( italic-A ADDOP:plus italic-B MULOP:cdot NUMBER:2 italic-pi Theta CLOSE:) italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-x POSTSUBSCRIPT:end PUNCT:, italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals OPEN:( italic-A ADDOP:plus italic-B MULOP:cdot NUMBER:2 italic-pi Theta CLOSE:) italic-L POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-y POSTSUBSCRIPT:end PUNCT:,
L_{x}^{\prime}=(A+B\!\cdot\!2\pi\Theta)L_{x},\quad L_{y}^{\prime}=(A+B\!\cdot% \!2\pi\Theta)L_{y},

NUMBER:2 italic-pi Theta POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-C ADDOP:plus italic-D MULOP:cdot NUMBER:2 italic-pi Theta ARG:end ARG:start italic-A ADDOP:plus italic-B MULOP:cdot NUMBER:2 italic-pi Theta ARG:end PUNCT:, FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start Phi POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi ARG:end RELOP:equals OPEN:( italic-A ADDOP:plus italic-B MULOP:cdot NUMBER:2 italic-pi Theta CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start Phi ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi ARG:end ADDOP:plus italic-B OPEN:( italic-A ADDOP:plus italic-B MULOP:cdot NUMBER:2 italic-pi Theta CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
2\pi\Theta^{\prime}=\frac{C+D\!\cdot\!2\pi\Theta}{A+B\!\cdot\!2\pi\Theta},% \quad\frac{\Phi^{\prime}}{2\pi}=(A+B\!\cdot\!2\pi\Theta)^{2}\frac{\Phi}{2\pi}+% B(A+B\!\cdot\!2\pi\Theta).
